lead_paragraph: Matches will be played on the middle Sunday at Wimbledon for the first time since 2004 after heavy downpours continued to plague the rain-ravaged tournament on Friday.

headline.print_headline: Wimbledon Confirms Middle Sunday Play as Rain Falls
headline.main: Wimbledon Confirms Middle Sunday Play as Rain Falls

snippet: Matches will be played on the middle Sunday at Wimbledon for the first time since 2004 after heavy downpours continued to plague the rain-ravaged tournament on Friday....
